Text: Ame̩ kʼe̩nyo̩ chʼe̩wñ ulaka-me̩, ku me̩ la fe̩do̩ e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩;
ku me̩ laño̩ je̩ o̩re̩la abo-mi,
Abu ki Jihofa aka ugbo amakache̩
Todule̩ i achʼodu ñwu me̩, kʼame̩ ki ñʼanʼane̩ ego ge̩ n,
E̩gbale̩ ukata abo ku ma gʼane̩ la achi,
I muda chʼe-mi, ukpahiu che̩ko̩ efu mi,
Me̩ gbʼe-i, o̩ko̩ nagba bʼume̩, ame̩ ku me̩ dʼoji dufu ef unyi Jeko̩b
Abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef uma kajo̩ tod e̩wñ eje̩,
